title: What the Difference between Git and Githup?
answer_1: Just Git is Alias for Githup
answer_2: Githup managing with Git, But githup does somethings others with original Tasks
answer_3: git is managing all your project from scratch, but github showing it
correct_answer: git is managing all your project from scratch, but github showing it

title: What does Git Status Show?
answer_1: Showing all Status before & after Git add Level.
answer_2: Showing Status of your Code in Project.
answer_3: Just Showing Status before Git add Level
correct_answer: Showing all Status before & after Git add Level.

title: Do you Can add another Branches?
answer_2: Yes I Can with some of Codes in cmd on my repo.
answer_3: No You Can't, already Exist Main Branch
correct_answer: Yes I Can with some of Codes in cmd on my repo.

title: Do you Have to add Commit Some Message?
answer_1: No You shouldn't, But you can add it.
answer_2: Yes You should do this To get Message with every Update.

title: What the Main Levels to upload your Project on Repo?
answer_1: Git init, then Git Add files, then Git Commit then git repoUrl then git push
answer_2: with Git Add then Git repoUrl then Git MainBranch then Git push.
answer_3: Git Add and Git RepoUrl Git Commit then Git push
correct_answer: Git init, then Git Add files, then Git Commit then git repoUrl then git push
